summary: App to automate social media content creation for a Ford dealership (including Sora 2 video generation) optimized for lead generation, tracking, and follow-up for car buyers.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Automotive dealership app logo wordmark, clean modern typography, black + warm accent (ford-lead-studio-logo.dim_512x512.png)
- Hero illustration of a modern car showroom with abstract marketing/analytics elements, warm neutral palette (dealership-hero.dim_1600x900.png)

existing_features.title: Implement Internet Identity sign-in and restrict the app so only authenticated users can access dealership content and lead management screens.

Create a dealership social media content generator that produces editable, exportable post packages for a Ford dealership using deterministic templates (no external AI calls): platform, campaign objective, model (e.g., F-150/Mustang/Explorer), offer details, tone, CTA, and output fields for caption, hashtags, shot list, and posting checklist.

Add a 'Video Asset' workflow that supports Sora 2 outputs without integrating Sora 2 directly: allow users to attach externally generated videos to a content package by uploading a video file or by storing an external URL plus metadata (prompt used, duration, aspect ratio, status).

Provide lead capture landing pages tied to content packages: generate a shareable landing page link per content package that includes tracking parameters and a lead form (name, phone/email, vehicle interest, timeframe, consent checkbox). Store submissions as leads associated to the originating content package.

Implement a lead tracking pipeline (CRM-lite) with statuses and follow-up tasks: New, Contacted, Qualified, Test Drive Scheduled, Won, Lost. Support notes, next follow-up date, and task completion logging per lead.
Add content-to-lead attribution views: for each content package, display counts of generated leads by status and a simple timeline of lead submissions.

Create a coherent, distinct visual theme appropriate for an automotive dealership marketing tool (not blue/purple): define a consistent color palette, typography scale, spacing, and component styling across all screens.

Add static generated brand visuals to the frontend and use them in the UI (logo/wordmark and a hero illustration) by placing assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and referencing them directly from the frontend.

new_feature_requests.summary: Automated social media content generator tailored for a Ford dealership (posts/captions/creative).
Generate dealership marketing videos via Sora 2 integration/workflow.
Lead generation optimization features (CTAs, landing/lead capture hooks) tied to content output.
Lead tracking and follow-up system (capture, track, and follow up with prospective car buyers).
